word_group.brief_definition: 制造部门；制造业；制造业部门
制造作业；制造业生产作业；制造业就业

bilingual.source: The integration of cim has streamlined our manufacturing processes.
bilingual.target: 计算机集成制造的整合简化了我们的制造流程。

bilingual.source: The integration of cmm has streamlined the entire manufacturing process.
bilingual.target: 计算机集成制造的整合简化了整个制造过程。

bilingual.source: A skilled toolmaker is essential for high-quality manufacturing.
bilingual.target: 一个熟练的工具制造者对于高质量的制造业至关重要。
该保修涵盖任何制造缺陷。

bilingual.source: The city is known for its manufacturing industry.
bilingual.target: 这座城市以其制造业闻名。

bilingual.source: Chromium is used in the manufacturing of stainless steel.
An odm can provide end-to-end solutions from design to manufacturing.
bilingual.target: 原始设计制造商可以提供从设计到制造的端到端解决方案。

bilingual.source: They plan to invest in the manufacturing industry.
bilingual.target: 他们计划投资于制造实业。

bilingual.source: Ferrous metals are commonly used in manufacturing.
bilingual.target: 含铁的金属常用于制造业。

bilingual.source: Alumina is widely used in ceramic manufacturing.
bilingual.target: 氧化铝广泛应用于陶瓷制造。

yingyinNormal.en: Because in many ways, manufacturing is the quintessential middle-class job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在许多方面制造业是中产阶层最典型的工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Areas like manufacturing, energy, technology, and autos are all booming.
yingyinNormal.zh: 制造业、能源业、科技领域和汽车行业都开始兴旺发达。

yingyinNormal.en: During the last decade, people thought the decline in American manufacturing was inevitable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去十年里，人们一直认为美国制造业的衰退是必然的。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite whatever you may have heard, America is actually the number-one manufacturing nation on earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了这些你听说过的，美国是地球上最大的制造业国家。

yingyinNormal.en: 12 million people live here now, feeding the largest manufacturing base in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现居住于此的一千两百万人正源源不断地向世界上最大的制造基地输送人才。

yingyinNormal.en: Our investments in American manufacturing have helped fuel its best stretch of job growth since the 90s.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在美国制造业上的投资，使其延续了自90年代以来最好的就业增长。

yingyinNormal.en: He specializes in high-value manufacturing, in goods that are worth far more than the cost of their raw materials.
yingyinNormal.zh: 主要是高端产品制造业，那些产品价值都要偏高，相比起它们的原材料。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you look beyond this port, you'll see something very different. Manufacturing is not really disappearing from America.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你看看别的地方，你将看到不同的东西，制造业并不是真正从美国消失了。

yingyinNormal.en: Manufacturing has grown. Our deficits have shrunk. Our dependence on foreign oil is down. Clean energy is up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 制造业在蓬勃发展，我们的赤字已经削减了，我们对国外石油的依赖在下降，清洁能源在发展。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm at Millennium Steel in Princeton, Indiana to have a town hall with workers on National Manufacturing Day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我正在印第安纳州普林斯顿的千禧钢铁公司，在全国制造业日和这里的员工们进行市政厅式的会话。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me make something clear up front. I want to stay, but with this product manufacturing lawsuit, I need to know where we stand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我先表明态度，我想留下，但是鉴于这起产品制造的诉讼，我得知道目前的进展如何。

yingyinNormal.en: And for the first time since the 1990s, American manufacturing is steadily adding jobs over 700,000 since 2010.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国的制造业也自上个世纪90年代以来首次增加就业机会，自2010年以来为70多万人提供了就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: In recent weeks, I've talked about these choices from raising the minimum wage, to creating new jobs in construction and manufacturing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的几周里，我一直在讨论着这些选择，从提高最低工资标准到在建筑和制造业上创造就业机会。

yingyinNormal.en: American manufacturing is growing almost twice as fast as the rest of the economy with new factories opening their doors at the fastest pace in decades.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国制造业在以其他产业将近两倍的速度增长，新的工厂在以几十年来最快的速度开门营业。

yingyinNormal.en: And after a decade of losing jobs, American manufacturing is once again adding them more than 700,000 over the past four and a half years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在丧失就业岗位10多年后，美国制造业的岗位又一次增加了，在过去的四年半时间里，增加了70余万个就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: So for many of us, this is an unsettling picture, a picture of a country that's importing more than it's making, of a manufacturing system that's dying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对我们大多数人来说，这画面让人真不安，这关于美国的画面进口的要比自己产的还多，对于制造业来说，这产业已经死了。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, this trench is as important to manufacturing today as the railroads were in 19th-century America, because it holds something that is connecting every home in this remote area to the world, something that's distributing goods and ideas on an unprecedented scale, fiber-optic cable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个海沟对于现在的制造业很重要，十九世纪美国的铁路因为它，拥有一些世界上远程连接每家每户的东西，一些分发物品，分享信息规模之大史无前例。光纤电缆。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't yell at me. I'm not manufacturing. I'm just Web design.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别对我吼啊，我又不是负责生产的，我只负责网页设计。

yingyinNormal.en: Mike Schroepfer helps run this place, and he knows better than anyone how Facebook embodies a new kind of manufacturing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 迈克·斯瑞普菲管理这里，他也比任何人都更加了解脸书是如何体现出这种新兴产业的。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Chandler, Arizona, home to what is perhaps the most innovative manufacturing site on earth, an Intel microchip factory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是亚利桑那州钱德勒市是创新的大本营，地球上英特尔芯片的生产基地。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 制造作业；制造业生产作业；制造业就业

sense_info_list.en: the business or industry of producing goods in large quantities in factories, etc.

examination_example.sentence: But even now, 54 percent of the jobs in the country are middle-skill jobs, such as construction and high-skill <highlight>manufacturing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但即使是现在，全国54%的工作岗位是中端技能的工作，如建筑业和高端技能制造业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Manufacturing</highlight> is not the economic engine that it once was.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造业不再是曾经的经济引擎。

examination_example.sentence: Despite trade competition and outsourcing, American <highlight>manufacturing</highlight> still needs to replace tens of thousands of retiring boomers every year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管存在贸易竞争和外包，美国制造业每年仍然需要替换调成千上万退休的婴儿潮一代。
